attributes.action: Salary Raise to all Front Line Key Workers.
attributes.additional_details: We are all exhausted due to the pandemic and that could be something that will give us a breath.
attributes.background:
I would like you to consider a salary raise to all front line key workers as a support. 
We are all exhausted due to the pandemic and that could be something that will give us a breath.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Mandatory Hazard Pay for all workers on the front line in the COVID-19 pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557249

Give a bonus to ALL the hard working key workers during this pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559833
